DataElement.preferredName: Lab Value Greater Than Platelet Count 50000 Without Platelet Transfusion Present Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator of whether the lab value for platelet count greater than 50,000 was present without a transfusion.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Lab Value Greater Than Platelet Count 50000 Without Platelet Transfusion Present
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The outcome of a laboratory test.:A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest exceeds another object in quantity or measure or value or status._Indicates a platelet count of at least 50,000 per cubic millimeter._Used to indicate the absence or lack of something or someone._The infusion of platelets into the bloodstream._Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The outcome of a laboratory test.

Concepts.definition: The outcome of a laboratory test.

Property.preferredName: Greater Than Platelet Count 50000 Without Platelet Transfusion Present
Property.preferredDefinition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest exceeds another object in quantity or measure or value or status._Indicates a platelet count of at least 50,000 per cubic millimeter._Used to indicate the absence or lack of something or someone._The infusion of platelets into the bloodstream._Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

Concepts.definition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest exceeds another object in quantity or measure or value or status.
Indicates a platelet count of at least 50,000 per cubic millimeter.
Used to indicate the absence or lack of something or someone.
The infusion of platelets into the bloodstream.
Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ReferenceDocuments.name: PQT
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was a lab value for platelet count greater than 50,000 present without a transfusion?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient have a peripheral platelet count of greater than 50,000/uL without a transfusion within 7 days after initial nadir??

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the platelet count recover to greater than 75000/uL without transfusion for 7 days after nadir during this reporting period?
